sentences.en: Fear of failure can become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
sentences.cn: 害怕失败可能会真的导致失败。

sentences.en: He was slack in fulfilling his promises and responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 在履行诺言,担负责任方面,他是松弛的.

sentences.en: I found it all very fulfilling.
sentences.cn: 我发觉一切都令人感到非常满足。

sentences.en: If you expect to fail, you will fail. It's a self-fulfilling prophecy .
sentences.cn: 你如果预期失败，就会失败。这是一种自我应验的预测。

sentences.en: In certain circumstances speculators are capable of creating self - fulfilling prophecies.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下,投机者能够创造出 自我 实现的预言.

sentences.en: It is a self - fulfilling prophecy to assume that your information workers are untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 它是个 自以为是 的预言,认为你的信息工作者是不值得信任的.

sentences.en: Nursing is hard work, but it can be very fulfilling.
sentences.cn: 护士工作很艰苦; 但可以使人感到满足.

sentences.en: Nursing is still one of the most fulfilling careers.
sentences.cn: 护理仍是最令人有成就感的职业之一。

sentences.en: Rachel was very pleased with herself for fulfilling her dreams.
sentences.cn: 瑞秋很高兴自己实现了梦想.

sentences.en: Rational expectations are on average self - fulfilling.
sentences.cn: 理性预期一般是 自行 实现的期望.

sentences.en: She succeeded in fulfilling herself both as an actress and a mother.
sentences.cn: 在作为演员和母亲两个方面,她都充分发挥了自己的才能.

sentences.en: The past 10 years have been the happiest and most fulfilling of his life.
sentences.cn: 过去10年是他一生中最快乐、最充实的时期。

sentences.en: This intoxicated him, for immediately he saw the opportunity of fulfilling his long - contemplated dream.
sentences.cn: 这使他陶醉了, 因为他立即发现了实现他向往已久的梦想的机会.

sentences.en: Work on the positive, creating beautiful, loving and fulfilling relationships.
sentences.cn: 致力于好的方面，努力营造美好的、友爱的、令人满意的关系。

sentences.en: Working for others can be most fulfilling.
sentences.cn: 为他人而工作会使人感到极大的满足.

sentences.en: You have been very remiss in fulfilling your obligations.

words.tran_cn: 令人满意的；能实现个人抱负的；令人高兴的

phrases.tran_cn: v. 完全实现自己的抱负

trans.tran_cn: 使人满足的，令人愉快的
trans.tran_en: making you feel happy and satisfied because you are doing interesting, useful, or important things

trans.tran_cn: 履行（诺言等）( fulfill的现在分词 )，执行（命令等），达到（目的），使结束，满足( fulfil的现在分词 )，执行，尽到，应验
